title: Be Honest!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Here. For you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh, what is this all of a sudden? What are you planning by giving this tribute to me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Huh? Tribute? Of course it’s not a tribute. If you don’t want it, then fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>W-, wait! I never said I didn’t want it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, if you want it, then just take it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Geez, you can’t take a joke at all, huh, Maki.... Eh, this is....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You were looking at it when we all went shopping the other day, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yeah, but why? It’s not my birthday or anything, so I can’t just accept it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Just throw it away if you don’t need it. It’s also a thank you gift. For the Nico Nico cream puffs. My family really liked it when I brought some home.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>....Well, if it’s a thank you gift, Nico will gladly accept it. You should’ve said something earlier if you liked the Nico Nico cream puffs that much! Nico will make you some more! You reaaally aren’t honest, are you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wha-, it’s not like that! I would just feel bad if I kept being on the receiving end and.... Like I said, stop grinning!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
